name: Cosmic Eater
description:
This is my first game(I've ever created for game jam) made alone in 2-3 days for ScoreSpace GameJam #20.

It is a game where you must eat as many planets as you can. There are enemies that shoot missiles into you, but you can eat them! Also, every 60 seconds a boss spawns. Boss battle is a great opportunity to earn 1 HP and decrease game speed a little bit.

Please, read the tutorial inside the game before you head into playing! There is everything you need to know!

It has an online leaderboard I implemented using LootLocker!

Please, write your opinion about the game in the comments below. Also, I'd appreciate it if you report any bugs you've encountered during your session. Thank you!
